version_description:
[Latest Updates]
Bug fixes and performance improvements.

[Recent Updates]
1. fixed internet connection failure in rare cases. 
2. fixed problem of no response when login fails.

1. Scan to login NetEase webmail.
2. Load more mails automatically when reaching the bottom of mail list.
3. Load mail bodies faster.
4. Long press to forward picture attachments being viewed.
5. Improved long mail display.

[Latest Updates]
Bug fixes and performance improvements.

[Recent Updates]
1. Scan to login NetEase webmail.
2. Load more mails automatically when reaching the bottom of mail list.
3. Load mail bodies faster.
4. Long press to forward picture attachments being viewed.

1. More timely notification.
2. Supported notification of POP3 accounts.
3. Faster display of mails.
4. Optimized signing-up of NetEase mail accounts.

1. Adapted to iOS 10
2. Adapted to watchOS 3
  - Add Mail Master to complication
  - Receive new mail notification immediately
  - View and reply mails on Apple Watch
Bug fixes and performance improvements.
Bug fixes and performance improvements.

1. Able to clean up cache of pics and attachments manually.
2. Able to change ringtones of new mail notification.
3. Able to switch languages in settings.

1. Fixed the problem of some accounts' mail receive failure.
2. Fixed the problem of NetEase Enterprise mail accounts' re-login failure.
Bug fixes and performance improvements.

1. Set later notification for todo mails
2. Bug fixes and performance improvements

1. Set later notification for todo mails
2. Bug fixes and performance improvements
Bug fixes and performance improvements

New design. New communication
1. Integrate mails of same subject to view correspondences
2. Chatting-like quick reply

[Latest Updates]
1. Fixed logging failure problem
2. Fixed mail missing problem in 「All Inboxes」

[Recent Updates］
New design. New communication
1. Integrate mails of same subject to view correspondences
2. Chatting-like quick reply

[Latest Updates]
Fixed preview failure of compressed files

[Recent Updates］
New design. New communication
1. Integrate mails of same subject to view correspondences
2. Chatting-like quick reply
3. Fixed logging failure problem
4. Fixed mail missing problem in 「All Inboxes」
Recognize and filter promotions in inbox to help you focus on important information

1. Support long press on pics, links.
2. You can find 「Help & Feedback」 in  「Settings」 when encountered with problems.
3. Optimize mail loading speed of QQ, Gmail, etc.
Bug fixes and performance improvements
Fix the display issue of attachments on iPad

1. Support sending attachments under 3GB for NetEase mail accounts.
2. Able to translate English mail body to Chinese.
Bug fixes and performance improvements
Bug fixes and performance improvements

1. Support Outlook authorization. Hotmail and Outlook accounts with two-step-verification is currently able to be added.
2. Optimized new mail notifications of POP3 accounts.
3. Able to share screenshot to WeChat with one click.
4. Able to execute quick sending process cancellation when making mistake deletes.

「Latest Updates」
Bug fixes and performance improvements.

「Recent Updates」
1. Support Outlook authorization. Hotmail and Outlook accounts with two-step-verification is currently able to be added.
2. Optimized new mail notifications of POP3 accounts.
3. Able to share screenshot to WeChat with one click.
4. Able to execute quick sending process cancellation when making mistake deletes.

1.  View invitations and add to calendar.
2. Able to find mails with attachments instantly.
3. Select recent contacts when composing a mail.

1. View invitations and add to calendar.
2. Able to find mails with attachments instantly.
3. Select recent contacts when composing a mail.

Here comes Master Accout to sync important information between multi-devices.

Login with Master Account to enable following services:
-Add mail account within a blink
-Guarantee contacts never get lost by uploading to cloud 
-Instant mail filter on mobile devices

There's more to be expected with Master Account.

「Latest Updates」
We are ready for iPhone X.

「Recent Updates」
Here comes Master Accout to sync important information between multi-devices.

Login with Master Account to enable following services:
-Add mail account within a blink
-Guarantee contacts never get lost by uploading to cloud 
-Instant mail filter on mobile devices

Login with Master Account to enable following services:

-Guarantee contacts never get lost by uploading to cloud

1. Provide new design of more professional signature.
2. Able to add attachments from cloud storage service like iCloud Drive.
3. Support mail recall of NetEase email accounts.
4. Support account alias for easier recognition of multi-account users.

1. Provide new design of more professional signature.
2. Able to add attachments from cloud storage service like iCloud Drive.
3. Support mail recall of NetEase email accounts.
4. Support account alias for easier recognition of multi-account users.

1. Able to adjust font size when checking an email.
2. Optimized signature.
3. More virtual phone numbers are supported when register mail address with phone number or login with Master Account.

1. No advertising mode is launched. 
2. Bug fixes and performance improvements.

1. Write to @Recipient, when you receive the mail @you , you will be reminded

1. Write to @Recipient, when you receive the mail @you , you will be reminded
2. Scan to log in to the web version function optimization
3. Add notes and addresses to the contact details page
4. Optimized reading and loading performance
5. Reading letter pages supports language internationalization

Fixed the problem of blank page when reading letters

1. Optimization: Some verification error prompts
2. Bug fixes and performance improvements.
More optimizations:
1. Write emails can be @recipients, and reminders will be strengthened when receiving letters
2. Fix: The problem that some reading pages are blank
3. Optimized: Support scanning to log in to the web page
4. Optimization: Reading letter loading performance
5. Reading letter pages supports language internationalization

1、Optimized loading speed of reading letters
2、Reading the text of the letter can be viewed and saved separately
3、Reading letter attachments support long press to display the menu
4、Letter-reading contacts support long press to copy
5、Search support display search history
6、Search keyword recommendation logic optimization
7、Mailing list display optimization
8、Add folder notification status reminder, and support quick opening
9、File center loading speed optimization
10、Bug fixes and performance improvements

1. The letter-reading translation has been upgraded and optimized to enhance the translation speed and accuracy;
2. Search optimization: solve the problem that the recently sent emails cannot be searched;
